text: Alka Gurjar is an Indian politician. She is the National General Secretary of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). She also works as the Co-incharge of the BJP in Delhi. Alka Gurjar was a member of the Rajasthan Legislative Assembly from 2013 to 2018. She won the 2013 election from the Bandikui constituency in Rajasthan. == Life and career == She was born on 21 February 1961 in Malpura, Rajasthan. She has completed M.A., L.L.M., and Ph.D. degrees. She was selected for the Rajasthan Administrative Services (RAS) and completed the training, but did not join government service. Instead, she entered politics. In 2013, she won the election from the Bandikui constituency and became a Member of the Rajasthan Administrative Service. She served as an MLA until 2018. In the past, she has served as the Spokesperson and Vice President of the BJP in Rajasthan. Alka Gurjar is married to Nathu Singh Gurjar, a senior BJP leader and former Panchayati Raj Minister in the Rajasthan government. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Rajasthani politicians Category:Indian Hindus
title: Alka Gurjar
